title: Police: 2 dead, others injured in northeast Albuquerque shooting
content:
ALBUQUERQUE, N.M. (KRQE) – Police are investigating a shooting that happened in northeast Albuquerque Monday night.
Officers arrived at the home near Wyoming and Copper around 11:00 p.m. in response to a shooting call, the police department says.
The Albuquerque Police Department says when officers arrived on scene, they found two deceased victims and two injured subjects inside the home. The injured subjects were then transported to a local hospital with serious injuries.
A Violent Crimes Unit was called out and detectives are currently investigating.
No word on the identity of the victims or any possible suspects.
Anyone with information is asked to contact police.
